name: Puti Machher Jhaal
extraInfo: This recipe goes best with hot rice.
steps: Clean and wash the Puti Mach, drain excess water, marinate with salt and a little bit of turmeric powder and keep aside.
Grind Mustard and Green Chillie to a fine paste and keep aside.
Heat oil in a pan, fry the Puti Mach and keep aside.
In the remaining oil add black cumin seeds and sauté for ½ minute.
Mix the Mustard and Green Chillie paste in 1½ cups of water and add to the frying pan.
Add salt and turmeric powder and let the mixture come to a boil.
When the mixture comes to a boil add the Puti Mach and let it boil till the mixture thickens.
Add finely chopped coriander leaves and 1 tsp of mustard oil.
Stirfry till the gravy thickens and adheres to the puti Mach.
Your Puti Maacher Jhaal is ready to be served.
